briefTitle: Magnetic Brain Stimulation for the Treatment of Adult Depression

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of major depression with a current episode
* Hamilton Rating Scale for Depression score higher than 20
* No response or intolerance to antidepressant medication in the current depressive episode

Exclusion Criteria:

* Current use of antidepressants
* Diagnosis of psychosis or anxiety disorder
* Current substance abuse
* Seizures or history of head trauma

outcomeMeasures.title: Depression Remission, as Measured by the Hamilton Rating Scale for Depression
outcomeMeasures.description: The Hamilton Rating Scale for Depression 17-item total score ranges from 0 to 52 with higher scores indicating more depression. Remission is defined as a total score of â‰¤ 8
